entry.title: Optimism Targets ‘Ethereum Equivalence’ With New L2 Upgrade￼
entry.summary: Ethereum scaling solution Optimism today announced Bedrock, an upgrade that improves speeds and cuts costs for those that trade on the L2. Optimism is a rollup: a Layer 2 scaling solution that batches transactions on another blockchain, then feeds them back to Ethereum as a single transaction. entry.title: FTX Launches US Equities Trading with Stablecoins as a Funding Option
entry.summary: FTX now operates the first stock trading platform that allows users to fund their accounts with fiat-backed stablecoins like USDC.

entry.title: Decentralized Social Graph Lens Protocol Goes Live
entry.summary: Lens Protocol is a decentralized social graph that allows developers to build web3 social media platforms on the Polygon network. Using Lens, users can mint a profile, follow others, and create and collect posts all on-chain.

entry.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Hash Rates Hit All-Time Highs Despite Bear Market
entry.summary: Cryptocurrency miners continue to pump computing power into the Ethereum and Bitcoin networks despite their tokens’ recent price drop.
